Room.Name: The Holy Order of the White Rose Training Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the training facility inside the Holy Order of the White Rose.
Room.LongDescription: You are now worthy to train to the level of Gallant Warrior, First Class. You have exceeded the standards set by this facility and we commission you go out out into the world standing proudly for good and justice. In order to be commissioned to a Protector, you must seek out the Shrine of Truth and Fairness in northwestern Oceancrest.
